div.bibl: Bulletin Order Sons of Italy in America-Grand Lodge of Illinois, Jan. 15, 1934.p.4. A WELL MERITED HONOR.

body.p: It is with the greatest of pleasure that we learn of the honor conferred upon the Italian Consul in Chicago, Chevalier Official Dr. Giuseppe Castruccio, "Gold Medal Hero."
The Italian Government has honored him with the "Commendadella Corona D'Italia" for his good work among the Italians in the Chicago Consular District.
